alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 9:42PM CDT until June 16 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR EASTERN CLEVELAND AND WESTERN POTTAWATOMIE COUNTIES... At 941 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northeast of Etowah, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Oklahoma City, eastern Norman, Shawnee, Tecumseh, Slaughterville, Pink, Tribbey, Wanette, Etowah, Brooksville, Macomb, Stella, Lake Thunderbird, Bethel Acres, Little Axe, and Trousdale. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
